columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: episode_key
columns.dc:title: Episode Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each PMHC MDS episode. The Episode Key is unique and stable for each episode at the level of the organisation. This key must link to an existing episode within the PMHC MDS.

columns.name: intake_organisation_path
columns.dc:title: AMHC Episode - Intake Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Intake Organisation that referred the client to the hub service. In conjuctionion with the intake key, this allows linkage from the hub episode back to the intake.

columns.name: intake_key
columns.dc:title: AMHC Episode - Intake Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to the intake organisation. The Intake Key is unique and stable for each intake at the level of the intake organisation. In conjuctionion with the intake organisation path, this allows linkage from the hub episode back to the intake.

columns.name: referral_out_organisation_type
columns.dc:title: Referral Out Organisation Type
columns.schema:description: Type of organisation to which the client is being referred.
